RBLXGGI.name: Find Everything
RBLXGGI.desc:
ðŸ’¡ Currently in Early Access! Players who buy early access will get exclusive rewards when the game fully releases.

An online 3D platformer/scavenger hunt about exploration, stupid jokes, and finding tons of Things!

Unlock new moves at the Thingsburg Gym! Explore a massive, ever-growing world! Find ridiculous worlds & meet interesting characters! And more...

CONTROLS:
Space/A: Jump Button
Shift/X: Action Button
Right Mouse: Lock/Unlock Camera

Early Access Guide & FAQ: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/2037657
